Html:
Hello,

I've tried downloading the "HtmlAgilityPack.Documentation.chm" file a couple of times, and when it opens the contents to the left will open correctly; however, the main content window only displays:

Navigation to the webpage was canceled      

What you can try:     

Retype the address.  

Is anyone else having this problem?..  or does anyone else have an idea as to why it's happening?

Thanks in advance,

George
Right click on the file and select properties and then click the Unblock button. Windows XP SP3, Vista, 7 disable chm's
